Package org.wtc.eclipse.platform.helpers

Interface Summary
IAntHelper Helper to execute Ant scripts.
IEditorHelper Helper for manipulating files through the source editor.
IHelperConstants Commonly used constants for all helper implementations.
IJavaDebuggingHelper Helper for interacting with the views in the debug perspective and for verifying debugging operations are executed as expected with a currently running process (In other words, if a test is testing that a breakpoint will be hit in an application deployed to a server, it is the responsibility of the caller to start that server in debug mode.
IJavaHelper Helper for java-specific actions.
IJavaProjectHelper Helper for creating Java projects.
IPerspective Describes a perspective that can be opened in the workbench.
IProjectHelper Helper for creating and manipulating projects.
IProjectHelperConstants Commonly used constants for project helper implementations.
IResourceHelper Helper for manipulating files and folders at a low level.
ISimpleProjectHelper Helper for creating Simple projects.
ITestHelper Helper for injecting JUnit behavior into a test directly.
IUIHelper Helper for additional UI driver macros and UI generated input that is visible to tools and helper implementations.
IView Describes a view that can be opened in the workbench.
IWorkbenchHelper Helper workbench specific tasks.
 

Class Summary
EclipseHelperFactory Factory for finding Helper implementations.
IWorkbenchHelper.MarkerInfo Class that describes expected markers for a workspace build.
 

Enum Summary
IEditorHelper.Placement  
IWorkbenchHelper.JobWaitType  
IWorkbenchHelper.Perspective  
IWorkbenchHelper.View
